title: Modular Neural Network Design and Pattern Profiling for Aircraft Trajectory Prediction

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational neural network theory, linear algebra, probability theory, and Python programming experience
context.additional_context: Practical application-focused training for working professionals, integrating theoretical learning with hands-on practice in a collaborative learning environment using digital devices (tablets/laptops)

learning_goals: Learners can explain methodologies for decomposing aircraft trajectory prediction problems using modular neural network design.
Design a multi-layer modular neural network structure for pattern profiling and optimize hyperparameters
Implement a module integration and online pattern recognition system using genetic algorithms
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
